name: koa-quests-service
comment: change the above main key value to index.local.js when running locally

scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template ./sam-template.yaml --s3-bucket koa-quests-service-bucket --output-template sam-template.packaged.yaml --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file sam-template.packaged.yaml --stack-name KOAQuestsServiceStack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region us-east-1
scripts.sam:deploy: sam deploy --stack-name KOAQuestsServiceStack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --s3-bucket koa-quests-service-bucket --region us-east-1 --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --no-confirm-changeset
scripts.package-deploy: npm run build && npm run sam:build && npm run sam:deploy
